Calvin Burnett (ubochí irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị, 1921, Cambridge, Massachusetts rụo ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọctoba, 2007 na Medway, Massachusetts) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese onyinyo na ónyé nkuzi nka.
Calvin Burnett gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Massachusetts School of Art na 1942, ma nata MFA ya na Mahadum Boston na 1960
Ọ kụziri ihe n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ dị n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ United States, gụnyere Massachusetts College of Art na DeCordova Museum
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ụzọ sárá mbárá na United States, nà gallery nà ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie gụnyere Smithsonian Institution nà Brooklyn Museum.
